item.description: How about a flight up north or west for some spectacular leave peeping? We live in one of the worlds best foliage areas. We could take a few routes. You decide where on your RSVP. Choices could be Sanford Maine, Glens Falls NY, or Laconia NH. I'm sure we can arrange a Sunday morning flight. Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Leaves to Peep, blueberry pancakes to eat!
